body: We are looking for a person that will act in accounting department and will be responsible for financial and accounting activities.Various daily accounting Activities, MEC activities; accounts reconciliations; improving working procedures; ensuring local countries compliance; supporting business units and local controllership teams.Responsibilities:Provides financial analysis and accounting daily activitiesEstablishes and maintains relationships with internal & external customers including stakeholders.Provides Month end closing reconciliations & analysis.Supports policy and process improvement and identifies opportunities .Identifies issues and proposes solutionsWork cooperatively with local finance team member and overseas.Ability to understand systems & financial working practices QualificationsRequirements:Advanced English and Hebrew language knowledgeFlexibility in work hours, working program from Sunday - ThursdayBachelor's degree/degree in Finance/Accounting/EconomyAbility to work independently as well as in the teamKnowledge and experience in finance & accounting, preferably with working experience of more than 3 years (preferably in global companies)Good organization skills and ability of investigating of open, aged items on BS accountsGood interpersonal skills and ability to work within the team, under time pressureGood communication skillsGood analytical skillsWillingness to developVery good interpersonal relationshipsAbility to work with virtual teamsVery good MS Office (Excel, Outlook, Power Point) and computer skills
title: Controllership Financial Analyst – Hebrew Speaker
